backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor placeholder with no logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing voice‑guidance‑related bugs, file touchpoints, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of major frontend files describing styling, PWA setup, state helpers, hooks, and Player/voice‑guidance logic.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base layers plus extensive CSS variable themes for light/dark modes and global border/background styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React app with PWA manifest, theme color, and favicon.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA manifest defining metadata, start URL, colors, orientation, and icons.
frontend/src/App.tsx: App routing and layout with header logic, conditional footer tabs, and route-based navigation.
frontend/src/components/BreathCyclesDura: Dialog for selecting breathing cycles, computing total duration, and saving a chosen preset.
Breathing animation circle showing phase color, timing, and optional segmented session progress.
frontend/src/components/charts/BreathHol: SVG line chart plotting breath-hold durations over time with labeled endpoints.
frontend/src/components/charts/WeeklyMin: Vertical bar chart showing weekly minutes with proportional bar heights.
frontend/src/components/CustomPatternFor: Form component for editing inhale, hold, and exhale durations of a BreathingPattern with numeric inputs.
frontend/src/components/ExerciseTileCard: Clickable tile card displaying an exercise’s icon, title, description, and an info button.
frontend/src/components/HomeExerciseCard: Interactive exercise card with start action, optional duration editing dialog, and an info button.
frontend/src/components/SegmentedCircumf: Renders a segmented circular progress indicator based on elapsed and total duration.
frontend/src/components/SessionList.tsx: Table listing past breathing sessions with formatted date and duration.
frontend/src/components/VerticalVolumeCo: Vertical slider control for adjusting a numeric value with optional icon display.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook creating and managing an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and invalidating dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useBreathingEngine.ts: Hook managing breathing phases, timing, voice cues, and haptics for a guided breathing pattern.
frontend/src/hooks/useHaptics.ts: Simple hook providing a vibration helper using the browser’s vibrate API.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, handling identity loading, login, logout, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/usePerExerciseDuratio: Hook managing per-exercise durations via localStorage with default fallback and setters.
frontend/src/hooks/useWakeLock.ts: Hook that requests or releases a screen wake lock based on an active flag.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind-based styles defining theme variables, typography, and breathing animations.
frontend/src/lib/ambientAudio.ts: Controller class for looping rain and wave audio with volume control and exclusive playback.
frontend/src/lib/breathingPatterns.ts: Defines preset breathing patterns and a utility to compute safe cycle lengths.
frontend/src/lib/exerciseInfoContent.ts: Static descriptive content for each breathing exercise, including intros and sections.
frontend/src/lib/localStorageStore.ts: Utility functions for storing and retrieving breath records, sessions, and exercise durations from localStorage.
frontend/src/lib/playerDurationGuards.ts: Validation helpers ensuring safe session durations and guarding against premature auto-stop.
frontend/src/lib/sessionTypes.ts: Type definitions for breath-hold records and breathing session objects.
frontend/src/lib/settingsStore.ts: LocalStorage-backed getters and setters for ambient mode, volume, and meditation settings.
frontend/src/lib/statsDerivations.ts: Functions deriving stats like last 7 days minutes, breath-hold chart data, and recent sessions.
frontend/src/lib/storageKeys.ts: Constants defining all localStorage key names used by the app.
frontend/src/lib/voiceGuidance.ts: Implements volume control and multiple speech synthesis helpers, including queued and async speech plus a cancel function.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app root with React Query and Internet Identity provider, rendering the main App.
frontend/src/pages/About.tsx: Displays app information, premium upsell, and quick settings with navigation back to home.
frontend/src/pages/Custom.tsx: Provides a form for creating a custom breathing pattern and selecting cycle count before starting the player.
frontend/src/pages/ExerciseInfo.tsx: Shows detailed info for a selected exercise and allows starting the mapped breathing pattern.
frontend/src/pages/Home.tsx: Renders exercise tiles with durations, navigation to info pages, and start actions for preset patterns and a test.
frontend/src/pages/Player.tsx: Runs the breathing session player, loading pattern and settings, managing audio, wake lock, duration, and session logging.
frontend/src/pages/Settings.tsx: Renders the settings page allowing users to configure voice guidance, ambient sounds, and other feedback options using values persisted in settingsStore.
frontend/src/pages/Stats.tsx: Displays weekly breathing minutes, breath-hold trends, and recent session history using data from localStorage and chart components.
frontend/src/pages/Test.tsx: Implements a breath-hold timer with start/stop controls, tracks elapsed time, and stores best records in localStorage.
frontend/src/pwa/registerServiceWorker.t: Registers the service worker on page load to enable PWA functionality.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS with custom colors, fonts, breakpoints, and plugins for the project's design system.
project_state.json: Stores metadata describing the project’s features, architecture, and current state for build or documentation tooling.
